abstract: Director Cameron Crowe emerges from a series of personal and professional setbacks to make his first feature film since 2005, We Bought a Zoo, in which Matt Damon plays a widower who takes over a dilapidated wildlife park.
snippet: In “We Bought a Zoo,” the director Cameron Crowe’s first feature film since 2005, Matt Damon’s character takes over a dilapidated wildlife park.
lead_paragraph: In “We Bought a Zoo,” the director Cameron Crowe’s first feature film since 2005, Matt Damon’s character takes over a dilapidated wildlife park.

headline.main: Cameron Crowe Gets Out of the House
headline.seo: Cameron Crowe’s ‘We Bought a Zoo,’ With Matt Damon
headline.print_headline: Cameron Crowe Gets Out of the House
